name: TVDocumentViewController.Event
desc: Events that can be triggered on the document view controller.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Create a new document view controller event based on a string value.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Create an instance of a new document view controller event based on a string value.

items.name: static let appear: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document appears.

items.name: static let disappear: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document disappears.

items.name: static let highlight: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is highlighted.

items.name: static let holdSelect: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is held down and selected.

items.name: static let load: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is loaded.

items.name: static let play: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is played.

items.name: static let select: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is selected.

items.name: static let unload: TVDocumentViewController.Event
items.desc: An event that signals when the document is unloaded.
